title: The anti-traversing 2D Array formula.
description: Have you ever thought about the mathematical relation between the columns and rows of a bidimensional array (2d matrix)? This data structure hides a data location formula that helped me to avoid the time complexity of O(n²), which is a terrible scenario, turning it into a constant time complexity - O(1). A full explanation, with real test cases and Unit Tests are waiting for you.

title: In 2019, get out of unemployment! Be a Web Developer.
description: There were numerous vacancies for web developers on the wall, at the same time, 12.7 million people were unemployed in Brazil, such a sad situation persisted in my mind. Back at my house, I've recalled a free course, offered by the renowned Bob Tabor (Senior Program Manager at Microsoft), present at Microsoft Virtual Academy.

title: Map Item Navigation for Android - Open-source component.
description: For great user experience, the usage of maps together with the ordered list is used very often in mobile applications. This article presents an open-source application for Android that provides a fully functional component.

internationalizations.title: Geo Distance search with MySQL & PHP.
internationalizations.description: Nowadays, geolocation is essential for most of the basic daily activities. Who never have asked Google where is the closest market? In this article, I show a practical example of how to create a SQL Query that does a geolocational search based on a radius range and a fixed geolocational point.

internationalizations.title: Pesquisa por distância geográfica com MySQL e PHP.
internationalizations.description: Atualmente, a geolocalização é essencial para a maioria das atividades diárias básicas. Quem nunca perguntou ao Google onde está o mercado mais próximo? Neste artigo, mostro um exemplo prático de como criar uma consulta SQL a qual faz uma pesquisa geolocalizada com base em um raio de abrangência e um ponto geográfico fixo.

title: Sending authenticated email in PHP.
description: With the appliance of the email security policy on the Web 2.0 came the need to take measures that would hinder the practice of spamming, among the measures taken, it is the use of authenticated e-mail, which means that for each e-mail sent, we would have the signature of the host who sent it, thus, there would be greater control over who, eventually, practice the spamming. In this article, I show you how to send the authenticate e-mail, increasing the chances of your email get read by the target user.

title: Sharing Intent for Android - Open-source component.
description: Applications like Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, etc... have the ability to receive content to be shared. This gives us a wide range of possibilities, being possible to share videos, texts, URLs and even the application's page in the PlayStore for users to install your application.
